practicals.name: Tokenization
practicals.aim: Apply text preprocessing techniques for any given text: Tokenization
practicals.con: We have implemented tokenization as a text preprocessing technique, effectively breaking down the input text into individual tokens. This process has allowed us to structure the text for further natural language processing tasks, demonstrating its critical role in text analysis.

practicals.name: Stemming
practicals.aim: Apply text preprocessing techniques for any given text: Stemming
practicals.con: We have applied the stemming preprocessing technique to the given text, reducing words to their base or root form. This process has simplified the text for subsequent natural language processing tasks, though it may result in non-standard word forms.

practicals.name: Lemmatization
practicals.aim: Apply text preprocessing techniques for any given text: Lemmatization
practicals.con: We have implemented lemmatization as a text preprocessing technique, effectively reducing words to their base or dictionary form. This process has improved the accuracy of subsequent natural language processing tasks by ensuring the words are standardized and contextually meaningful.

practicals.name: Stopwords Removal
practicals.aim: To apply text pre-processing technique for any given text using stop word removal technique.
practicals.con: Hence, we applied stop word removal pre-processing technique for the given text.

practicals.name: N-Gram Model
practicals.aim: To implement the N-Gram Model for the given input text in English and Hindi languages.
practicals.con: Hence, we have implemented the N-Gram Model for the given text in English and Hindi languages.

practicals.name: POS Tagging
practicals.aim: To study different POS tags and perform POS tagging on the given text.
practicals.con: Hence, we have successfully studied and performed the POS tagging on the given text.

practicals.name: Named Entity Recognition
practicals.aim: To implement the Named Entity Recognizer for the given input text.
practicals.con: Hence, we implemented the Named Entity Recognizer for the given input text.
